en.name: Difficult Sales
en.coverDescription: It can be easy to dismiss difficult customers as a waste of time, but remember: someone, somewhere is selling to these customers. Enter this course, and learn how to deal with their personalities and objections!

fr.name: Réussir une vente difficile
fr.coverDescription: Il peut être facile de considérer les clients difficiles comme une perte de temps, mais rappelez-vous: quelqu'un, quelque part, vend à ces clients. Entrez dans ce cours et apprenez à gérer leurs personnalités et leurs objections!

de.name: Erfolg in einem schwierigen Verkaufsprozess
de.coverDescription:
DEMNÄCHST BALD AUF DEUTSCH
It can be easy to dismiss difficult customers as a waste of time, but remember: someone, somewhere is selling to these customers. Enter this course, and learn how to deal with their personalities and objections!
